qas.question: What sub-group of literature emerged in the 20th century?

Who were two 20th century writers who blurred the lines between journalism and literature?

answers.text: William Burroughs, in his early works, and Hunter S. Thompson

qas.question: What two writers defined the lines between journalism and literature?

plausible_answers.text: expanded documentary reporting into strong subjective statements
